snippet: The Off Broadway hit “Love, Loss, and What I Wore” will close on March 25 after running for two and a half years and 1,013 performances.
abstract: Broadway production of Love, Loss, and What I Wore will close after 1,013 performances and the Pulitzer Prize-winning play Clybourne Park will begin previews at the Walter Kerr Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Off Broadway hit “Love, Loss, and What I Wore” will close on March 25 after running for two and a half years and 1,013 performances.
